cs3524.mud

Class Item

  • java.lang.Object
    • cs3524.mud.Item
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public class Item
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
    Represents an item. Any item can be picked up by players.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

      • weight

    • Constructor Detail

      • Item

        public Item(java.lang.String name,
            double weight)
        Creates an item with a given name and weight. Any item is identified by name, so the name field cannot be empty.
        Parameters:
        name - the name of the item
        weight - the weight of the item

    • Method Detail

      • equals

        public boolean equals(java.lang.Object obj)
        Compares two instances of the Item class. For this project, it was assumed, that any two items, which have the same name are considered equal. This is mainly to simplify searching through the list of items at any Location using the standard methods like .contains().
        Overrides:
        equals in class java.lang.Object
        Parameters:
        obj - an object to compare to
